Archie “Bulldog” Grimm.name: Archie “Bulldog” Grimm
Archie “Bulldog” Grimm.keywords:
53 years. Caucasian. Average height.
White hair. Black costume.
Beige overcoat. Scowl.
Archie “Bulldog” Grimm.profdef: Psychologist: By using 1 Resource point, Archie can tell if he is being lied to or knowingly omitting information.

Damien Barnes.name: Damien Barnes
Damien Barnes.keywords:
33 years. Black. Average height.
Brown short hair. Goat. Heavy dark circles.
Cassock. Rosary in hand.
Damien Barnes.profdef: Lay on Hands: By using 1 Resource point and touching a third party, Damien can tell if the person is possessed or closely related to a demon.

Elsa Faust.name: Elsa Faust
Elsa Faust.keywords:
47 years. Caucasian. Tall.
Long white hair. Pale skin. Shawl.
Black dress. Superior and haughty air.
Elsa Faust.profdef: Charismatic: by using 1 Resource point, Elsa can convince a third party of what she says.

Julian Cross.name: Julian Cross
Julian Cross.keywords:
61 years old. Caucasian. Tall.
White short hair. Panama hat.
Turtleneck. Long brown overcoat.
Julian Cross.profdef: Sensitivity: by using 1 Resource point, Julian can sense if a spirit haunts the precise place where he is.

Sunny O.name: Sunny O
Sunny O.keywords:
34 years old. Métis. Average height.
Brown. Mid-length. Leather jacket.
Shoulder bag with equipment.
Sunny O.profdef: Attentive to sounds: By using 1 Resource point, Sunny is able to pick up sounds inaudible to the ear and electronic voice phenomena through his equipment.
